member.name: M:ArrayUtilities.ArrayHelper.Min(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Calculates the minimum element. If min cannot be determined (e.g.: array is null, or empty) it will return .

member.name: M:ArrayUtilities.ArrayHelper.Max(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Calculates the maximum element. If max cannot be determined (e.g.: array is null, or empty) it will return .

member.name: M:ArrayUtilities.ArrayHelper.BubbleSort(System.Int32[],ArrayUtilities.SortDirection)
member.summary: Sorts the array using the bubble sort algorithm.
member.returns: The array having the elements sorted.

member.name: M:ArrayUtilities.ArrayHelper.Print(System.String,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Prints the array to the console.
member.param: Label used before the array elements.
